action.title: Furiosa
action.desc: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before her encounter and teamup with Mad Max.

action.title: Kingdom Of The Planets Of Apes
action.desc: Many years after the reign of Caesar, a young ape goes on a journey that will lead him to question everything he's been taught about the past and make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

action.title: The Fall Guy
action.desc: A down-and-out stuntman must find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster film.

action.title: Dune Part 2
action.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

action.title: Atlas
action.desc: In a bleak-sounding future, an A.I. soldier has determined that the only way to end war is to end humanity.

action.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
action.desc: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper and a drifter named Max.

action.title: Civil War
action.desc: A journey across a dystopian future America, following a team of military-embedded journalists as they race against time to reach DC before rebel factions descend upon the White House.

adventure.title: Avatar
adventure.desc: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

adventure.title: Raiders Of The Lost Arc
adventure.desc: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

adventure.title: Indiana Jones And The Temple Of Doom
adventure.desc: In 1935, Indiana Jones is tasked by Indian villagers with reclaiming a rock stolen from them by a secret cult beneath the catacombs of an ancient palace.

adventure.title: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade
adventure.desc: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

adventure.title: Sahara
adventure.desc: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the 'Ship of Death' in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

adventure.title: The Flight Of The Eagle
adventure.desc: In 1897 Swedish engineer S. A. Andrée with 2 colleagues prepares to fly over the North Pole in his balloon 'Eagle'.

adventure.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
adventure.desc: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.

comedy.title: If
comedy.desc: A young girl who goes through a difficult experience begins to see everyone's imaginary friends who have been left behind as their real-life friends have grown up.

comedy.title: The Idea Of You
comedy.desc: Solène, a 40-year-old single mom, begins an unexpected romance with 24-year-old Hayes Campbell, the lead singer of August Moon, the hottest boy band on the planet.

comedy.title: Mother Of The Bride
comedy.desc: Lana's daughter Emma returns from London and announces that she's getting married next month. Things become more complicated when Lana learns that the man who stole Emma's heart is the son of the man who broke hers years ago.

comedy.title: Kinds Of Kindness
comedy.desc: A man seeks to break free from his predetermined path, a cop questions his wife's demeanor after her return from a supposed drowning, and a woman searches for an extraordinary individual prophesied to become a renowned spiritual guide.

comedy.title: Barbie
comedy.desc: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

drama.title: Challengers
drama.desc: Tashi, a former tennis prodigy turned coach, turned her husband into a champion. But to overcome a losing streak, he needs to face his ex-best friend and Tashi's ex-boyfriend.

drama.title: Megalopolis
drama.desc: An architect wants to rebuild New York City as a utopia following a devastating disaster.

drama.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
drama.desc: The British military recruits a small group of highly skilled soldiers to strike against German forces behind enemy lines during World War II.

drama.title: The Iron Claw
drama.desc: The true story of the inseparable Von Erich brothers, who made history in the intensely competitive world of professional wrestling in the early 1980s.

drama.title: The Apprentice
drama.desc: The story of how a young Donald Trump started his real estate business in 1970s and 80s New York with the helping hand of infamous lawyer Roy Cohn.

drama.title: Oppenheimer
drama.desc: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

fantasy.title: Game Of Thrones
fantasy.desc: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

fantasy.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
fantasy.desc: Two ancient titans, Godzilla and Kong, clash in an epic battle as humans unravel their intertwined origins and connection to Skull Island's mysteries.

fantasy.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
fantasy.desc: When the discovery of an ancient artifact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must join forces to protect their home and save the world from a second ice age.

fantasy.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fantasy.desc: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

fantasy.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
fantasy.desc: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

fantasy.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return Of The King
fantasy.desc: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

horror.title: The Shining
horror.desc: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

horror.title: Alien
horror.desc: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin.

horror.title: I Am Legend
horror.desc: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

horror.title: Psyco
horror.desc: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

horror.title: The Thing
horror.desc: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

horror.title: Saw
horror.desc: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

horror.title: The Exsorcist
horror.desc: When a young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

horror.title: Scream
horror.desc: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.

horror.title: The Ring
horror.desc: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

horror.title: Halloween
horror.desc: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

musical.title: Emilia Perez
musical.desc: Mexico, today. Lawyer Rita receives an unexpected offer. She has to help a feared cartel boss retire from his business and disappear forever by becoming the woman he's always dreamed of being.

musical.title: Wicked
musical.desc: After two decades as one of the most beloved and enduring musicals on the stage, Wicked makes its long-awaited journey to the big screen as a spectacular, generation-defining cinematic event this holiday season.

musical.title: Wonka
musical.desc: With dreams of opening a shop in a city renowned for its chocolate, a young and poor Willy Wonka discovers that the industry is run by a cartel of greedy chocolatiers.

musical.title: The Lion King
musical.desc: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

musical.title: The Blues Brothers
musical.desc: Jake Blues rejoins with his brother Elwood after being released from prison, but the duo has just days to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home where the two were raised, outrunning the police as they tear through Chicago.

musical.title: A Star Is Born
musical.desc: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

musical.title: Bohemian Rapsody
musical.desc: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

parody.title: Spaceballs
parody.desc: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

parody.title: Hot Shots
parody.desc: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

parody.title: Scarie Movie
parody.desc: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

parody.title: Mars Attaks!
parody.desc: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

parody.title: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
parody.desc: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

romantic.title: Titanic
romantic.desc: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

romantic.title: Serendipity
romantic.desc: A couple search for each other years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.

romantic.title: Meet Joe Black
romantic.desc: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

romantic.title: The Notebook
romantic.desc: An elderly man reads to a woman with dementia the story of two young lovers whose romance is threatened by the difference in their respective social classes.

sci-fi.title: The Last One
sci-fi.desc: In the last one, we follow three people from different fields who changed forever after a misfortune. They will cross paths in the most unusual way possible.

sci-fi.title: Megalopolis
sci-fi.desc: An architect wants to rebuild New York City as a utopia following a devastating disaster.

sci-fi.title: Interstellar
sci-fi.desc: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

western.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
western.desc: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

western.title: The Revenant
western.desc: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

western.title: Django Unchained
western.desc: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

western.title: Tombstone
western.desc: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

western.title: The Hateful Eight
western.desc: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

western.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
western.desc: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

western.title: A Fistful Of Dollars
western.desc: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.
